news_header: Century Aluminum Co. has an RSI of 28.4, indicating potential buying opportunities as selling pressure may be easing.
news_text: Century Aluminum Co. (CENX) has an RSI reading of 28.4, significantly lower than the average RSI of 47.8 for metals and mining stocks. This low RSI suggests that heavy selling may be exhausting, presenting potential buying opportunities. Over the past year, CENX's shares have ranged from a low of $9.645 to a high of $25.39, with the last trade at $16.93, reflecting a 13.8% decline on the day.
